description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Blast, dodge and disintegrate your alien enemies in a desparate bid to save humanity. Wield shotguns, bombs and missiles going it solo or in a 2-4 player co-op frenzy. Better yet, destroy your friends in hilariously epic deathmatch action. Features beautiful sound and graphics, LIVE online highscores, hordes of vicious aliens and absolutely loads of addictive fun.
description.short: Blast, dodge and disintegrate your alien enemies in a desparate bid to save humanity. Wield shotguns, bombs and missiles going it solo or in a 2-4 player co-op frenzy.
